title: Problem with sudden rise of ping
body: So, In past couple days or I think it's been a week now. When I play LoL I would get sudden rise of ping and thus disconnecting me from game, my internet crashes and my Lap top freezes. Note: I have never had this problem before, if anyone had this kind of problem, let me know if there's a solution. Also, my Lap top never does this, only when I play LoL. So, I am a bit confused.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having an issue maintaining a connection to the server, which will result in put delays or lag spikes.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to fix this up and strengthen your connection.  Hopefully, the steps there will fix this up!
